Summary: It was a ship landing on the ground, dimond shape with lights surround it and in the top of it.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving from AZ to CA, Not exactly sure what time was it but it was about 2:00 to 2:30 am, The freeway was totally empty with no cars but me and some trucks in other side of the freeway wich is far from where i was, from a distance I notice a blinking light same color as a police light color which is blue, red and yellow, I thought its a police car as i drive close to it it was different and it has more lights surround it, The object was landing next to the freeway about 5 feets away from the freeway which is pretty close, The shape of it its like diamond the top looks like a cone it was dark i couldn't see the color of the object but it has light surrounding the cone and the are same size as a light bulb but the top of the cone it has a light look like a glass ball and in the inside 3 lights yellow,red and blue. It was very clear i pass by the object i was very scared for what i saw, I never believed in a UFO, i was scared to tell anyone don't know who to tell, people don't believe me so i just ignored it at that time, The object didn't move and even when i pass the object i look back in the mirror and its still there.The even happened last year in the summer time.
